UpdateSourceArgs: -c "cd dayz/223350; find keys -name \"*.bikey\" ! -name \"dayz.bikey\" -delete; IFS=\";\" read -ra subdirs_array <<< \"{{mod}};{{clientmod}}\"; for subdir in \"${subdirs_array[@]}\"; do [ -d \"$subdir/keys\" ] && \cp \"$subdir/keys/\"*.bikey keys/ >/dev/null 2>&1; [ -d \"$subdir/key\" ] && \cp \"$subdir/key/\"*.bikey keys/ >/dev/null 2>&1; done"

-NoProfile -Command "$mods = '{{mod}};{{clientmod}}' -split ';'; Set-Location dayz\223350; Remove-Item '.\keys\*.bikey' -Exclude 'dayz.bikey' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; $mods | ForEach-Object { if (Test-Path \".\$_\keys\") { Copy-Item -Path \".\$_\keys\*.bikey\" -Destination '.\keys' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue }; if (Test-Path \".\$_\key\") { Copy-Item -Path \".\$_\key\*.bikey\" -Destination '.\keys' -Force -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue } }"
